name: Aetherdrive Tonic
effect: Increases the recharge rate of your lanternâ€™s ability by 100% for 60 seconds.

name: Blitz Tonic
effect: Reduces damage taken by 45% for the next 3 hits.

name: Bulwark Tonic
effect: Reduces damage taken by 45% for the next 3 hits.

name: Frenzy Tonic
effect: Grants 15% increased damage dealt for 60 seconds. Grants 30% if a Behemoth is enraged.

name: Stamina Tonic
effect: Grants 50% increased stamina regen and 50% reduced stamina costs for 120 seconds.

name: Lifedrain Tonic
effect: 12% of all damage dealt will heal all nearby Slayers for 30 seconds.

name: Insight Tonic
effect: Grants 40% increased Wound damage dealt for 60 seconds.

name: Assault Tonic
effect: Grants 40% increased Stagger damage dealt for 60 seconds.

name: Granny's Antidote
effect: Removes Poisoned status. Available from September 17, 2020 to December 3, 2020.

name: Granny's Heartbreaker
effect: Increase critical strike chance and critical strike damage by 25% for 40 seconds. Available from September 17, 2020 to December 3, 2020.

name: Granny's Poison-Puller
effect: Absorb poison pools while this potion is active. After absorbing a pool, 12% of damage you deal heals all nearby Slayers for 10 seconds, Only 1 pool is absorbed at a time. Available from September 17, 2020 to December 3, 2020.

name: Ironhide Pylon
effect: Place a pylon that grants 40% decreased damage taken to all nearby Slayers for 45 seconds.

name: Cleansing Pylon
effect: Place a pylon that removes negative conditions from nearby Slayers and reduces their frostbite level by 25%. The pylons aura will also prevent frostbite levels from increasing.

name: Lifespring Pylon
effect: Place a pylon that restores 22 health per second to nearby slayers for 20 seconds.

name: Inspiring Pylon
effect: Throw a grenade that will detonate when impacting a Behemoth, dealing 240-450 damage and creating 3 healing orbs that seek out injured Slayers and heal them for 120 health each. Damage scales with weapon power.

name: Barrage Grenade
effect: Throw a grenade that deals 200-375 damage before splitting into 3 grenades, each dealing 96-180 damage. Damage scales with weapon power.

name: Concussive Grenade
effect: Throw a grenade that deals 240-450 damage and can interrupt Behemoths. Damage scales with weapon power.

name: Coldsnap Grenade
effect: Throw a grenade that deals 120-225 frost damage before splitting into 8 icy orbs that deal 32-60 frost damage each. Damage scales with weapon power.

name: Inferno Grenade
effect: Throw a grenade that deals 120-225 blaze damage and creates a pool of fire that deals 288-540 blaze damage over 4 seconds. Damage scales with weapon power.

name: Transfusion Grenade
effect: Throw a grenade that will detonate when impacting a Behemoth, dealing 240-450 damage and creating 3 healing orbs that seek out injured Slayers and heal them for 120 health each. Damage scales with weapon power.

name: Airstrike Beacon
effect: Targets an area on the ground for an airstrike, dealing 2100 damage to all Behemoths inside the area.

name: Healing Flask
effect: Restores 425 health five times per hunt and may revive the slayer once per hunt. Refills upon return to Ramsgate.
